鞸鞸鞸

鞸字的基本解释

鞸
bì
古同“韠”：“端委鞸带。”

鞸
bǐng
古同“鞞”：“鞸琫有珌。”

鞸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
亦作“鞞2”。
古代朝觐或祭祀时遮蔽在衣服上的一种服饰。后亦借指朝服。
[②]［bǐng］
［《古今韻會舉要》補鼎切，上迥］
同“鞞1”。
刀剑鞘。参见“鞸2琫”。

鞸字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞸； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1391第09
【廣韻】?吉切【集韻】壁吉切，?音畢。【集韻】本作韠。詳韋部韠字註。　又【集韻】簿必切，音邲。同䩛。詳䩛字註。

鞸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞸字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Emperor
bì
Gu Tong "韠": "Duanwei belt."
Emperor
bǐng
Gu Tong's "Yan": "Yan Ling has Luo."
Emperor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
Also known as "Yan 2".
A costume that was concealed on clothing during pilgrimages or sacrifices in ancient times. Later also referred to court clothes.
[②]［bǐng］
["Ancient and Modern Rhyme Meeting Essentials" Supplementing Dingqie, Shang Jiong]
Same as "鞞1".
Scabbard. See "鞸2琫".
Emperor
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞸; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1391 Page 09
[Guangyun] Jiqie [Jiyun] Bijiqie, sound complete. [Ji Yun] This is Yun. Detailed notes on Wei Fuyun.　[Jiyun] The book must be cut, and the sound is pounded. The same. Detailed note of the word.
